name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-cherry-picked-content
title: Cherry picked content
shortDescription: The Cherry-Picked Content Web Part is a modern replacement for the classic Content Editor Web Part, with a twist: code snippets can only be picked from approved document libraries.
longDescription: The Cherry-Picked Content Web Part is a modern replacement for the classic Content Editor Web Part, with a twist: code snippets can only be picked from approved document libraries.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
